body.description: Experience a close, comfortable shave with the BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Men’s Disposable Razor. This 13-piece razor kit for men contains one handle and 12 razor cartridges for an affordable shave with less waste. Featuring three blades, the BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Disposable Shaving Razor for Men delivers a close, efficient shave that leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. Each cartridge has an enhanced lubricating strip for extra glide over your skin, as well as a guard bar that aligns the hair for a better shave. For more control while shaving, the BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Disposable Men’s Shaving Razor has a pivoting head that moves with the contours of your skin and an ergonomic handle with a soft anti-slip grip. This eco friendly razor handle is made of 90 percent recycled plastic, and the packaging is 100 percent recyclable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BIC Comfort 3 Hybrid Men's Razor Triple-Blade Razor for a Close Shave Featuring three blades, the BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Mens Disposable Razors deliver a close, efficient shave to leave your skin feeling soft and smooth. For added convenience, each package includes refillable cartridges, so you can always have an extra to hand. Lubricating Strip for Enhanced Glide Enriched with aloe and vitamin E, these mens razor's large lubricating strip enhances glide along the contours of your face while you shave. The razor head also features a thick rubber guard bar that aligns the hair for a better shave. Ergonomic Grip for Added Control The BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Mens Disposable Razors feature a rubber handle with an ergonomic grip for greater control. The razor head pivots and adjusts to your movements as you shave, further enhancing control.

Comfort 3 Refillable Comfort 3 Advance Comfort 3 Twin Select Metal Sensitive Blade Count 3 3 3 2 1 1 Fresh New Handle + Refills Included ✓ Ergonomic Handle ✓ ✓ Anti-Slip Grip ✓ ✓ ✓ Pivoting Head ✓ ✓ Lubrication Strip Enriched with Aloe ✓ ✓ ✓ Metal Guard Technology ✓ Designed for Course and Curly Hair ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Razor for travel
reviews.reviewText: The BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Three-Blade Disposable Razor for Men has completely transformed my shaving experience. As someone with sensitive skin, finding the right razor that balances effectiveness with comfort has always been a challenge, but BIC Comfort 3 exceeds all expectations.What sets this razor apart is its three-blade design, which effortlessly glides over my skin, providing a close and smooth shave with each stroke. The blades are sharp yet gentle, ensuring a precise cut without causing irritation or razor burn, even on sensitive areas.The ergonomic handle is another standout feature of this razor. Its rubberized grip provides excellent control and maneuverability, allowing for a comfortable and secure hold during shaving. I no longer have to worry about the razor slipping from my grasp, even when my hands are wet.One of the best aspects of the BIC Comfort 3 razor is its refillable design. Instead of disposing of the entire razor after each use, I can simply replace the cartridge, which not only reduces waste but also saves money in the long run. It's a win-win solution that I can feel good about.Overall, I can't recommend the BIC Comfort 3 Refillable Three-Blade Disposable Razor enough, especially for those with sensitive skin. It combines exceptional performance with comfort and convenience, delivering smooth shaves with ease. Say goodbye to shaving woes and hello to a new level of comfort with BIC Comfort 3!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth shave for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have been a fan of the of the b i c hybrid 3 bladed razor about 9 years now my brother-in-law gave me a package and I shaved my head with him and I was very impressed I've been buying them at Walmart but their prices went up and this is a fairly decent price I believe I spent 10 or $12 for 12 cartridges and they shave really good I get about four or five head shaves on a beach razor if you look at work clothes save this is the razor to use if you're looking to save money this is the razor to use don't skip on quality for your face or your head or your legs if you're a woman for that matter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money
reviews.reviewText: This brand provides the best value for money on razors. The balm strip is really helpful for allowing the blade to glide easily. When this balm loses its moisture, it is time to change the blade. Each blade provides about 4 smooth shaves after which you need to change the blade as it starts to become painful while shaving. All in all, I am happy with these and I have been using these for the last 4 years at least. I don't plan to change any time soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I only bought these because there was a great sale on them. They do last longer than the single blade disposable kind my husband usually uses. I give them 5 starts for what they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves his razors they give him the best shave ever, and then you have the replaceable separate insert razors. Once it gets dull this is a great buy, and a great price..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay for a couple of uses
reviews.reviewText: I specifically got these to use on my bikini area. They are great for a couple of shaves but after that they kind feel like they are just dragging across the skin. Even using a high quality shave cream doesn’t make a difference. I would not want to use these on my face. I did get them on sale and just having to switch out the blade as opposed to a whole new razor is nice but I won’t purchase these again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very smooth shave.
reviews.reviewText: I have very thick beard on my cheeks. These razors are very effective and give me a smooth outcome. For the price you can’t beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a value, AND a good shave
reviews.reviewText: You buy 5 blade razors for an arm and a leg. How many shaves you get, 4, maybe 5? I buy these, I get 12 cartridges and put a fresh 1 on after 3 shaves. Such a deal, which is harder to come by in todays economy.
Very comfortable shaving, last for long time
Por el precio no esperaba mucho pero realmente me sorprendió la calidad de las hojas y su durabilidad es muy buena
Nice shave. Wish they were a bit less money
Vale a pena comprar. Preço e produto muito bom.

En lo personal estaba buscando unos rastrillos que me ayudaran para todo el cuerpo, ya que estoy en un tratamiento de depilación láser donde tengo que quitarme el vello específicamente con rastrillo, probé: Gillette y Venus, pero me acaba el filó en la mitad del cuerpo, pero este rastrillo es impresionante, ya que el cabezal se mueve y ajusta a las curvas del cuerpo, y el filo es extraordinario… compre dos paquetes y estoy súper satisfecha.
